0.text: Innate: Amumu's basic attacks and  Curse of the Sad Mummy mark enemies with Curse for 3 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications and  Despair's per-tick damage.

1.text: Cursed targets receive  10% bonus true damage from all incoming pre-mitigation magic damage.

0.text: Active: Amumu tosses a bandage in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit,  stunning them for 1 second and  pulling him to them, during which they are  revealed.

1.text: Amumu periodically stocks a Bandage Toss charge, up to a maximum of 2.

2.text: Despair can be cast during the dash.

0.text: Toggle: Amumu cries a continuous pool of tears, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies.
Passive: Amumu  reduces every instance of post-mitigation physical damage taken, capped at 50% of the damage instance.

1.text: Active: Amumu releases his anger, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

2.text: Tantrum's cooldown is  reduced by 0.5 seconds whenever Amumu is hit by a  basic attack.

0.text: Active: Amumu entangles surrounding enemies in bandages, dealing them magic damage as well as  knocking them down and  stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+5 ability power
+30 health
+25% base health regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spoils of War: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks execute minions below ( 50% / 30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Targon's Buckler, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPOILS OF WAR: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks  execute minions below ( 50% /  30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill  gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

Keywords

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+450 health
+35 armor
+35 magic resistance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Immolate: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 − 30 (based on level) (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within 325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds, increasing subsequent Immolate damage by 10%, stacking up to 6 times for a 60% increase.
Unique – Flametouch: At maximum stacks, your basic attacks create an explosion around you, applying a burn to all nearby enemies that deals your current Immolate damage to them over 3 seconds.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5% tenacity, 50 bonus health and 5% slow resist.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IMMOLATE: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 − 30 (based on level) (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within  325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds, increasing subsequent Immolate damage by 10%, stacking up to 6 times for a 60% increase.

Stats

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Absorb: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.
Unique – Dissipate: While at 6 stacks of Steadfast, gain 10% bonus movement speed and reduce all incoming magic damage by 25%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ABSORB: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming  immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.
